examples: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
The doctor managed to cure her of her illness.
El médico logró curarla de su enfermedad.
It is better to prevent rather than cure diseases.
Es mejor prevenir que curar enfermedades.
Finding it early is the key to curing most cancers.
Encontrarlo temprano es la clave para curar la mayoría de los cánceres.
